verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, wonderful love that takes me, Though wretched and stained with sin! Oh, marvelous grace that makes me All holy and pure within!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, mighty power that holds me, A helper forever near! Oh, perfect peace that folds me In danger and storm and fear!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, jubilant joy sustaining My faltering steps to the last! Oh, rapturous rest remaining When toiling and tears are past!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, matchless mercy that rates me Joint-heirs with the sinless Son! Oh, golden glory that waits me When tempests and clouds are done!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
